circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Scampton at 2005LT on September 2 on an operation to Berlin. While returning to base the following morning, it crash landed on Stone Pit Hills near Grimston. All four crew members escaped with minor injuries. 
Crew.
W/Cdr H. V. Satterley, 
Sgt K. Rogers,
Sgt J. R. Cross, 
Sgt H. Yardley.
